card.name: Cryptic Call
card.text: Choose two or four — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Tap each creature target player controls. • Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Profane Call
card.text: Choose two or four — • Search your library for a Demon card and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value. • Sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards. • Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. • Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Blazing Call
card.text: Choose two or four — • Blazing Call deals 3 damage to any target. • Blazing Call deals 1 damage to each creature. • Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. • Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Verdant Call
card.text: Choose two or four — • Search your library for a land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. • Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Illusory Companion
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more creatures with power 1 or less enter under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Deep Sea Consumer
card.text: Attune (Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control) When Deep Sea Consumer enters or attacks, {U}{U}{U}|Tap up to three permanents. {U}{U}{U}{U}|Put stun counters on those permanents. {U}{U}{U}{B}{B}|You draw three cards and lose 3 life.

card.name: Wasteful Decay
card.text: Target opponent discards a card. If a land card was discarded this way, create a tapped treasure token. If a creature card was discarded this way, create a tapped 1/1 black Zombie creature token. If a noncreature, nonland card was discarded this way, that player loses 3 life.

card.name: Wayward Impulse
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn. Add {R}{R} if this spell wasn't cast from your hand. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Forest's Watcher
card.text: Cadence (Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is greater than this creature's power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value greater than Forest's Watcher's power

card.name: Divine Call
card.text: Choose two or four — • Exile target player's graveyard. • Exile target enchantment. • Each player gains life equal to the number of cards exiled this turn. • Conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with "Draw a card.")

card.name: Rise From Depths
card.text: Target player mills two cards. Draw two cards. Pressurecoalesce {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {3}{U}{U} if seven or more cards are in your graveyard. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

card.name: Darkened Strix
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if you've discarded two or more cards this turn, return Darkened Strix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Crusader of the Blood Moon
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if a player searched their library this turn, Crusader of the Blood Moon deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Angelic Wrath
card.text: Exile all nonland permanents. Coalesce {8}{W}{W} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {8}{W}{W}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) As long as Angelic Wrath is on the battlefield, it has the activated and triggered abilities of all creature cards exiled by cards you control named Angelic Wrath.

card.name: Dragon of Arcane Frost
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if Dragon of Arcane Frost is on the battlefield or in your graveyard and you cast at least three instant or sorcery spells this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Intoxicating Decay
card.text: As an additional cast to cost this spell Torment yourself. (You lose 3 life unless you discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.) Creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Dragon of Celestial Wishes
card.text: Flying, Haste Whenever Dragon of Celestial Wishes attacks, exile a red card you own from outside the game. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it has mana value 4 or less. If you don't, you may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Unceasing Explorer
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Unceasing Explorer attacks or blocks, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Welcoming Light
card.text: Whenever a creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you gained at least 2 life this turn, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Visions of The Great Beyond
card.text: Visions of The Great Beyond costs {1} less to cast if there are three or more noncreature cards in your graveyard. Counter target spell.

card.name: Arcane Onslaught
card.text: Once each turn, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

card.name: In Search of Grandeur
card.text: Whenever you cast a permanent spell from your hand, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with mana value 1 greater than the spell cast without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Magius Udel, Oracle of Light
card.text: Whenever you scry, put a loyalty counter on Magius Udel. [0]: Scry 1. [-2]: Draw card. [-4]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 2."

card.name: Darkness Unchained
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. When Darkness Unchained is put into your graveyard from your hand or library, mill two cards. (This doesn't include being cast.)

card.name: The Last Dozandi
card.text: Menace, Haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you lost 3 or more life this turn, return The Last Dozandi from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Drorix, Divine Outcast
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 Ally creature token that's all colors. [-1]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them into your hand. [-X]: Exile target creature with mana value X or less until Drorix leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Call of Chaos
card.text: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Coalesce—Exile a white card from your graveyard and a black card from your graveyard. (You may cast this from your graveyard for Exile a white card from your graveyard and a black card from your graveyard. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

card.name: Arcane Oracle
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, surveil 1. At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast at least two instant or sorcery spells and drawn at least two cards this turn, return Arcane Oracle from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Explorer of Finality
card.text: When Explorer of Finality enters or attacks, choose one— • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • You draw a card and lose 3 life. • You may put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Outpost of Radiant Fire
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, that spell gains "If this spell would deal damage to a permanent or player it deals that much damage plus 1 instead." Then you may pay {W}. If you do, that spell gains lifelink.

card.name: Unfathomable Exploration
card.text: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. {GU}, Exile Unfathomable Exploration from your graveyard: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Caves of Premonition
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {8}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's not a land, you may cast it without paying its mana coast. Otherwise, put it onto the battlefield. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each nonland permanent you control.

card.name: Galen, Kinzan Engineer
card.text: Flash. When Galen enters, you may activate one of his loyalty abilities as though it had flash. You may activate a different loyalty ability of Galen this turn. [+1]: Add {C}{C}{C}. You can't spend this mana to cast spells. [-1]: Draw a card. [-2]: Whenever you activate another ability this turn, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: In Search of Brilliance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with mana value equal to one plus the sacrificed permanent's mana value without paying its mana cost.
Indestructible
